title: Experts at Green Deal Ukraina | GDU
author: unknown
text: Dr. Maksym Chepeliev Research Assistant Professor, Center for Global Trade Analysis, Purdue University Maksymâ€™s work focuses on the analysis of a variety of global and regional economic issues, including climate change mitigation, agricultural policies, food and nutrition, poverty and inequality, regional and multilateral trade agreements, and circular economy. His country-based work, with a particular focus on Ukraine, explores interlinkages between energy transition, environmental impacts, and development.
excerpt: Each team member brings a unique blend of expertise, passion, and dedication that collectively fuels our project's success.
